item.description:
Are you looking for like-minded progressives to "roll" with in Boston? Want to cross-promote your events and campaigns in bowling shoes? Are you new to the area and looking for groups to get involved in? Are you psyched about building strong cross-issue coalitions on the lanes?

Join Socializing for Justice at Lanes & Games for Bowling for Justice (10 pin this time)!

No program. No speaker. Just arrive and enjoy yourself.

RSVP yes, maybe or no.

At Socializing for Justice (SoJust) events you can hang out with friends, make new ones, find a date, get the scoop on a job, and find out what's going on this weekend - political or social. And the best part is that SoJust members share your vision of building a more just world.

*Lanes & Games is by the Alewife T station. You can ride the Red Line, but we've started a carpooling thread just in case. Click here for driving and T/walking directions.

Games are $4.75 each per bowler
Shoe rental = $2.75 per bowler
Group fee = $2 per attendee (includes non-bowlers).
*You pay for what you play*
item.name: Bowling for Justice
